cli-parse.cmd: ip-policy <string> [ id <number> ] [ {before|after} id <number> ] [ from <ip_addr|string_64> [ <mask> ] ] to local-subnet [ service <string> ] [ action {permit|deny|nat|inter-station-traffic-drop} ]

cli-parse.cmd: ip-policy <string> [ id <number> ] [ {before|after} id <number> ] [ from <ip_addr|string_64> [ <mask> ] ] [ to <ip_addr|string_64> [ <mask> ] ] [ service <string> ] action permit log [ {initiate-session|terminate-session} ]

cli-parse.cmd: ip-policy <string> [ id <number> ] [ {before|after} id <number> ] [ from <ip_addr|string_64> [ <mask> ] ] [ to <ip_addr|string_64> [ <mask> ] ] [ service <string> ] action deny log packet-drop

cli-parse.cmd: ip-policy <string> [ id <number> ] [ {before|after} id <number> ] [ from <ip_addr|string_64> [ <mask> ] ] [ to <ip_addr|string_64> [ <mask> ] ] [ service <string> ] action inter-station-traffic-drop log [ {initiate-session|terminate-session|packet-drop} ]
